programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeka draudzene saka, ka ies vakariņās ar draugu vīrieti, tādēļ greizsirdīgais Džeks sāk rīkoties; Direktors Durbins, Mērija, Stefa un Mišela palīdz Helēnai pēc šķiršanās.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks ir saniknots, atklājot, ka A.P. Bio studenti ir nozaguši viņa mīļoto Hārvardas pildspalvu. Viņš lūdza tai nepieskarties. Direktors Durbins un Helēna atkārtoti neiztur pārbaudes.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema un Alekss gatavojas savai pirmajai romantiskajai nedēļas nogalei izbraukumā, kamēr Britai pārsteidzošos veidos ir grūti tikt galā ar vientulību. Kerola negribīgi izmēģina Al-Anon, un Džeimss meklē palīdzību.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema saņem iespēju intervēt Dragu karalieni Bobu, taču viņa sabotē savu iespēju, kad viņai un Aleksam ir pirmās ķildas. Tikmēr Kerola ir spiesta nopietni uztvert savu Al-Anon programmu, un Džeimss mēģina atjaunot saikni ar Mindiju.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss

programme.title: Ofiss

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Dvaits izpalīdz Andželai izvairīties no nepatikšanāsm. Endijs uzzina to, un izmanto situāciju, lai satuvinātos ar Maiklu. Dvaitam jātiek galā ar šo - viņam jāriskē tikt atlaistam vai jāatklāj savas attiecības ar Andželu.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Dženna ir pārdomas savu seksuālo pastaigu laikā. Džeka mamma ierodas Ņujorkā, lai veiktu medicīnisku procedūru, un Treisijs mēģina atrunāt dēlu no došanās uz koledžu.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Kāzās Rejs atkal sastop sievieti, ar kuru viņš pirmo reizi sagājās kopā. Viņš pastāsta ģimenei par reizi, kad viņš nepavadīja viņu līdz durvīm.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: 43 gadus vecais Roberts satiekas ar 22 gadus vecu meiteni Eriku. Marija un Debra atklāj, ka viņa jaunā draudzene ir pārāk jauna savam vecumam. Frenks uzaicina viņu uz savu dzimšanas dienas ballīti, kas izvēršas par katastrofu.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: "Jaunais Šeldons" savu septiņu gadu maratonu noslēdz ar obligāti skatāmu divu sēriju sezonas noslēgumu. Džims Pārsons un Meims Bialiks atkārto savas lomas Šeldona Kūpera un Eimijas Faras Fauleres lomā neaizmirstamā televīzijas piedzīvojumā.

programme.title: Mūsdienu ģimene
programme.desc: Džejam jāpielāgojas savai jaunajai sievai Glorijai un viņas dēlam. Tikmēr Klēra risina jautājumus ar savu ģimeni. Mičels un Kamerons nolemj adoptēt bērnu.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Debras vecāki ierodas ciemos Pateicības dienā. Abi atzīstas, ka dosies uz laulību konsultāciju.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Vīrietis nejauši uzšķauda Rejam un nu viņš domā, ka ir saķēris šī vīrieša baktērijas.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Endijs izdara neiespējamo - viņš liek visiem ofisā skumt par Dvaita prombūtni, kas šobrīd strādā Staples. Oskars atgriezies birojā un Maikls sarīko meksikāņu ballīti.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls lūdz Džimam atrast vīrieti striptīzdejotāju Filisas vecmeitu ballītei, bet viņš tā vietā atrod Bena Franklina atdarinātāju. Tikmēr vīrieūs vecpuišu ballīte iet kā smērēts - līdz Maiklam nekomfortabla kļūst klātbūtne striptīzdejotājas tuvumā.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks kļūst radošs - viņa jaunā biznesa ideja par Kebltaunu ir neveiksmīga. Dženna sarīko publisku sabrukumu, lai atgūtu Polu. Sērijā piedalās arī Džeimss Mārsdens.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: "Jordanas karaliene" pārņem "TGS". Viesaktieri Šeri Šeperda un Mērija Stīnburgena.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Atskatos uz sava tēva pagātni, Sema nonāk pretrunās ar Kerolu, cīnoties ar viņu pašu bēdām un tiekoties ar savu tanti Alisi. Sema un Džeimss atkal tiekas AA bērēs un iekrīt vecos netikumos.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Olīvijas bērnu sagaidīšanas pasākumā Sema ir spiesta pieņemt, ka viņai ir nepieciešams jauns sponsors, taču nesaņem Olīvijas ieteikumu. Kerola apciemo Felīsiju, un abas atklāj, ka viņām ir vairāk kopīga, nekā domāts.

programme.title: Mūsdienu ģimene
programme.desc: Džejs aizved Filu ar aviāciju saistītā ekskursijā ar katastrofāliem rezultātiem. Kamēr Menijs ir viņu mājā, Klērai jāpierod pie tā, ka viņi patiesībā ir radinieki.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Spriedze kļūst nokaitēta, vampīriem gatavojoties uzņemt divreiz gadā notiekošo vampīru orģiju.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Nandors apciemo vienu no saviem dzīvajiem pēcnācējiem. Atkal uzrodas mīļākais no Nadjas pagātnes.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs Ziemassvētkos sagādā Debrai patiešām lielisku dāvanu, tāpēc viņa piekritīs ļaut viņam doties spēlēt golfu.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejam sākušās pārdomas par sevi - viņš nepalīdzēja Debrai, kad viņa aizrijās.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls pārspīlē savu nozīmi Filisas kāzās un padara sevi par muļķi. Pema pamana, ka Filisa nozagusi visas viņas idejas no oriģinālā pašas kāzu plāna.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls ir viesis Raiena uzņēmējdarbības lekcijās, bet tur Maikls uzzina, ka Raiens par Dunder Mifflin runājis vien negatīvo. Tikmēr ofisā Dvaits mēģina noķert sikspārni.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Eiverija atgriežas mājās no Ziemeļkorejas, un Džekam ir aizdomas, ka viņai tur bijis romāns. Tikmēr Krisa jūtas neērti, mainot dzimumu lomas ar Lizu, un Dženna mēģina iemācīties dienvidu akcentu reklāmas rullītim.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks atklāj Eiverijas slepeno romānu Ziemeļkorejā tieši pirms zvēresta atjaunošanas. Kriss ir gatavs spert drosmīgu soli attiecībās ar Lizu, un Kenets ir spiests dzīvot kopā ar Heizelu.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema cīnās ar domām vai atklāt Aleksam par nesenajiem notikumiem. Tikmēr Džeimss atrod spēku savā sabiedrībā.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema turpina meklēt savu augstāko spēku. Brita un Džoels organizē šķiršanās ballīti. Felīcija apsver nākamos soļus attiecībās ar Pīteru.

programme.title: Mūsdienu ģimene
programme.desc: Džeja bijusī sieva pirmo reizi parādās pēc nepatīkama incidenta Glorijas un Džeja kāzās.

programme.title: Mūsdienu ģimene
programme.desc: Konflikts starp Meniju un Lūku futbola spēles laikā izplatās arī viņu vecāku starpā.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Ņujorkas pievārtē kādā senlaicīgā un baisā Steitenailendas mājā mitinās iedzīvotāji, kuru dzīve lielākoties sākas iestājoties tumsai. Nama stāvus apdzīvo trīs asinsūcēji vampīri – Nandors, Lazlo un Nadja –, enerģijas vampīrs Kolins Robinsons, kurš strādā birojā un ar savu nomācošo klātbūtni izsūc enerģiju saviem kolēģiem, un Giljermo, Nadīnas paziņa. Kā jau kārtīgi vampīri, viņi ir vairākus gadsimtus seni, un iekļaušanās mūsdienu pasaulē tiem nereti sagādā galvassāpes. Otrajā sezonā vampīriem būs jāsaskaras ar zombijiem, raganām, spokiem, slepkavām, interneta troļļiem un citiem mošķiem. Tikmēr Giljermo būs jāizšķiras, vai pašam kļūt par vampīru.

programme.title: Agata un Ištaras lāsts
programme.desc: Agata dodas uz Bagdādi, kur sastop jaunu un naivu arheologu, kam vajadzīga viņas palīdzība, jo noplukušajā villā, kur visi uzturas, notiek vairākas slepkavības.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Albergs un Gibsonas policijas nodaļa strādā, lai atrastu vainīgo, kad Kasandra nonāk dzīvībai bīstamā situācijā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Šajā sezonā varoņus gaidīs daudz piedzīvojumu. Brekenrīds un Mērdoks piedalīsies skotu spēlēs, Krebtrijam būs jādodas glābt savu tēvu un nāksies sastapties ar senu ienaidnieku, un Terenss Maierss lūgs Mērdoka palīdzību, kad būs apdraudēts premjera amata kandidāts. Bet viena no sērijām pirmo reizi būs uzņemta mūzikla stilā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Šajā sezonā varoņus gaidīs daudz piedzīvojumu. Bet viena no sērijām pirmo reizi būs uzņemta mūzikla stilā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Slavens rakstnieks nonāk Elīzas izmeklēšanas centrā, kad atbilstoši viņa grāmatu saturam tiek veiktas vairākas slepkavības. Djūks sadarbojas ar jauno superintendantu un problemātisku jaunu detektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad slavenais Peregrīnas ēkas arhitekts tiek atrasts miris saunā kopā ar cita vīrieša sievu, Peregrīna un Džeims uzskata, ka greizsirdīgais vīrs varētu būt vainojams slepkavībā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza seko bēglim, kurš apsūdzēts slepkavībā. Bēglis ir jāatrod ātrāk par policiju, jo citādi viss tiks zaudēts.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Kad radio tiek ziņots, ka Lielbritānija drīz iesaistīsies karā, Džeimss atklāj tuberkulozes gadījumu Hestongreindžā, bet Ričards lūdz par to neziņot ministrijai.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Bijušais detektīvs Karls Albergs pārceļas uz nelielu piekrastes pilsētiņu, lai rastu mierinājumu un saskaras ar virkni slepkavību. Iedzīvotāja slepkavībā Albergs aizdomās tur citu vietējo iedzīvotāju.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Bijušais detektīvs Karls Albergs pārceļas uz nelielu piekrastes pilsētiņu, lai rastu mierinājumu un saskaras ar virkni slepkavību. Iedzīvotāja slepkavībā Albergs aizdomās tur citu vietējo iedzīvotāju.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Šajā sezonā varoņus gaidīs daudz piedzīvojumu. Brekenrīds un Mērdoks piedalīsies skotu spēlēs, Krebtrijam būs jādodas glābt savu tēvu un nāksies sastapties ar senu ienaidnieku, un Terenss Maierss lūgs Mērdoka palīdzību, kad būs apdraudēts premjera amata kandidāts. Bet viena no sērijām pirmo reizi būs uzņemta mūzikla stilā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Šajā sezonā varoņus gaidīs daudz piedzīvojumu. Brekenrīds un Mērdoks piedalīsies skotu spēlēs, Krebtrijam būs jādodas glābt savu tēvu un nāksies sastapties ar senu ienaidnieku, un Terenss Maierss lūgs Mērdoka palīdzību, kad būs apdraudēts premjera amata kandidāts. Bet viena no sērijām pirmo reizi būs uzņemta mūzikla stilā.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Komisārs Megrē
programme.desc: 1955. gada vasarā ar nazi tiek sadurta jauna sieviete, kas ir ceturtā nogalinātā dažu nedēļu laikā. Vai Megrē spēs atrast slepkavu pirms nākamā uzbrukuma?

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.desc: Šajā sezonā varoņus gaidīs daudz piedzīvojumu. Bet viena no sērijām pirmo reizi būs uzņemta mūzikla stilā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza seko bēglim, kurš apsūdzēts slepkavībā. Bēglis ir jāatrod ātrāk par policiju, jo citādi viss tiks zaudēts.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Zigfrīds un Tristans kļūst par atbildīgajiem, kad Holas kundze dodas projām, lai tiktos ar kādu svarīgu personu no pagātnes. Dženija atklāj Helēnai, ka viņa pieņēmusi nozīmīgu lēmumu par nākotni.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Kad radio tiek ziņots, ka Lielbritānija drīz iesaistīsies karā, Džeimss atklāj tuberkulozes gadījumu Hestongreindžā, bet Ričards lūdz par to neziņot ministrijai.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza seko bēglim, kurš apsūdzēts slepkavībā. Bēglis ir jāatrod ātrāk par policiju, jo citādi viss tiks zaudēts.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Slavens burvju mākslinieks ir kā iekritis akā. Visa Londona apspriež šo noslēpumu, un kāda avīze nolīgst Elīzu veikt izmeklēšanu, neskatoties uz to, ka pie šīs lietas jau strādā Hercogs.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ir 1940. gada pavasaris, un Skeldeilas namā visus gaida pārmaiņas. Džeimss un Helēna prāto, kad pienāks īstais brīdis ģimenes pieaugumam, nezinot, vai Džeimsu iesauks armijā vai ne. Tristana prombūtni sajūt visi, bet visskarbāk Zigfrīds, kurš cenšas uzturēt pieaugošo mājsaimniecību un braši turēties gaidāmo izaicinājumu priekšā. Uzplaukst Holas kundzes un Helēnas draudzība, abas lūkojas nākotnē. Un ierodas jauns veterinārijas students Ričards Kārmondijs, radot ķibeles mājā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Šajā sezonā varoņus gaidīs daudz piedzīvojumu. programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.desc: Detektīvs Albergs izmeklē divu sieviešu noslēpumaino nāvi. Abas tika atrastas mežā dīvainās pozās.

programme.title: Džeina Eira

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārplas draugs tēvs Gormans tiek atrasts noslepkavots. Kad viņa saņem sarakstu ar vārdiem, ko Gormans nosūtījis brīdi pirms nāves, viņa apņemas atrast drauga slepkavu.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: The Recall
programme.desc: When five friends vacation at a remote lake house they expect nothing less than a good time, unaware that planet Earth is under an alien invasion and mass-abduction.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Music critic Bob is out of a job, addicted to Zoloft, and trying to wrangle the menagerie of animals that his wife Amy has accumulated. Will adopting a baby cure their existential angst? Or should they just rescue another duck?

programme.title: Attrition
programme.desc: When a Thai girl with mythical powers goes missing, Axe and his old team unite in attempts to bring her back.

programme.title: Castle Falls
programme.desc: Rival gangs seek out millions of dollars hidden inside a luxury condominium thats scheduled to be demolished, but first they have to deal with the janitor who found the loot first.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Treasure Island
programme.desc: Young Jim Hawkins and Peg-legged Long John Silver set sail for adventure in Robert Louis Stevensons classic tale of dastardly pirates, swashbuckling heroes, buried treasure, and a young boys courage during the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Three friends - a reporter, an oil analyst and a financial executive - reunite after ten years and accidentally uncover one of the key, hidden reasons for what motivated the war in Iraq. The trio struggles to present evidence to major media that America invaded Iraq to force oil sales from the Euro back to the Dollar to preserve US global monetary supremacy. Against incredible odds, the team must face their pasts, find willing sources to corroborate the story, and survive the conspirators as they push to bring the truth to light.

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Lucia is an aging Italian actress and director (beautifully portrayed by Antonionis and Fellinis actress Lucia Bosa), decides to come back to the small town where she had spent her happy childhood. She wants to bring the TV where television has never been seen before. She reaches out to the women in the local community with a project that might change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.

programme.title: Cartel War
programme.desc: L.A. undercover cops disregard the law to bring down the most powerful drug mob in the United States. Loosely based on Mexicos once most powerful drug cartel leader, this journey into the drug underworld cuts to the bone and through the heart. Hard realities intertwine when an elite division of L.A. undercover narcotics cops, Division 123, begins to peel away the layers of a powerful drug cartel to undermine their manipulative influence. A study in humanity: of the cops and the challenge they face to balance a commitment to those they love, against their commitment to task and ability to protect. At one moment, immersed in the glitz of L.A.s glamor and the next, looping into the citys seedy underbelly, "DISRUPT/DISMANTLE" follows these officers as they go head-to-head with a ruthless yet seductive foe. Echoing the familiar scenario of cops vs. bad guys, this story presents itself with new vigor, fresh and focused on the lives of determined cops making choices - and mistakes. As the discovery of bodies begins to tarnish the investigation - including the brutal murder of one of their own, Division 123 disregards the law to bring down the most powerful drug mob in the U.S...

programme.title: Fatal Sin
programme.desc: A boy and a girl fall in love. But on the night they met, she was drunk and stoned and he toke advantage of her. Although she does not remember almost anything from that night, she remembers something that may compromise their relationship.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Train Master
programme.desc: 62 year old Jeremiah Wilson is truly the Train Master of Willamette Western Railroad. He lives, breaths, and eats railroad. When Brett Banner, 32 year old heir to New York Eastern talks his dad into purchasing Willamette Western, there is immediately a clash between himself and Jeremiah. Jeremiah is fired by Brett two years from retirement and turns into a angry, depressed grandfather. When Bretts nine year old son Justin realizes Jeremiahs grandson Thomas can drive a locomotive, he kidnaps and holds Thomas favorite dinosaur ransom. Justin, Thomas and 3 other children board an old engine in for repairs and accidentally turns it into runaway engine causing a chain reaction of events.

programme.title: Uncle Nino
programme.desc: A distant, slightly dysfunctional family is brought closer together when the fathers long-estranged Uncle Nino comes from Italy to Chicago for a surprise visit.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: See You in September
programme.desc: See You in September is an original romantic comedy set in current day Manhattan. The film centers around Lindsay, a beautiful woman who seemingly has it all, but is deeply afraid of commitment. When she finds out that her therapist takes a vacation for the entire month of August she feels shocked and abandoned. Instead of taking this news lying down, Lindsay enlists the help of her acerbic best friend Monica to come up with a solution. With the assistance of "Craigs List", Lindsay puts together a group therapy session for all Manhattanites who are in need of therapy, but more importantly angry at their therapists for abandoning them.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself among the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

programme.title: Dragon Blade
programme.desc: When corrupt Roman leader Tiberius arrives with a giant army to claim the Silk Road, Huo An teams up his army with an elite Legion of defected Roman soldiers led by General Lucius to protect his country and his new friends.

programme.title: Wake
programme.desc: When things get tough for offbeat Carys Reitman, she does what any emotionally isolated, modern girl would do - she goes to strangers funerals. At one fateful funeral, she unexpectedly meets Tyler, a man mourning his fiancee. Despite the warnings of her undertaker best friend Shane and her roommate Lila, she finds herself connecting to someone for the first time. Searching for answers, Carys goes to see her estranged mother to confront her past. And as she tries to open herself to the risks of love with Tyler, she realizes she may have more to fear than just a broken heart.

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.title: ALL the OLD KNIVES
programme.desc: CIP aģents veterāns Henrijs Vīnē atkalapvienojas ar savu bijušo kolēģi un mīļāko Sīliju.

programme.title: Seifs
programme.desc: Madride, Spānija, 2010. Kamēr visa pilsēta seko līdzi valstsvienības veiksmīgai dalībai Pasaules kausa izcīņā, pārdrošu zagļu grupa meklē ceļu uz vienu no visdrošākajām un vislabāk apsargātajām vietām uz planētas.

programme.title: Gals klāt!
programme.desc: Bohēmisku ballīti aktiera Džeimsa Franko mājās pārtrauc neizprotamas un graujošas dabas parādības. Vairums viesu namu pamet, bet paliek daži viņa draugi, tai skaitā arī Sets Rogens un Džona Hils. Pārtikas un dzeramā nav daudz, iziet uz ielas ir pārāk bīstami, taču "zālītes" un citu narkotisko vielu viņiem ir pārpārēm. Aktieri vada dienas gan izklaidējoties, gan apsverot nākotnes filmu scenārijus un strīdoties, bet pienāk brīdis, kad nopietna iemesla dēļ puiši ir spiesti bēgt no mājas, lai meklētu glābiņu un atklātu atbildi uz jautājumu - kas ir tas, kas viņus apdraud?

programme.title: Supergriboši
programme.desc: Jebkurā parastā skolā Setu, Evanu un Fogeli sauktu par jefiņiem. Starp citu - tā pieņemts uzskatīt arī viņu skolā. Sets spēj runāt un domāt tikai par seksu, Evans ir pārāk jauks un godīgs, bet Fogelis ir vienkārši katastrofa. Katram no viņiem ir sava sapņu meitene un lieli dzīves plāni, taču parasti viņi pavada laiku, skatoties porno un graužot popkornu vai cepot dārzā desiņas kopā ar vecākiem. Līdz brīdim, kad Seta pielūgtā meitene uzaicina viņus uz tīņu ballīti, dodot līdz šim svarīgāko uzdevumu viņu dzīvē - sagādāt alkoholu.

programme.title: Krustnagliņu slepkava
programme.desc: Ārēji perfekta ģimene ir satriekta, kad pārlieku tuvu viņu mājām sāk uzdarboties sērijveida slepkava. Dilans Makdermots perfekti izstāsīts šo stindzinošo stāstu par amerikāņu ļaunumu.

programme.title: Es gribu tevi atpakaļ
programme.desc: Nupat kā par vientuļniekiem kļuvušie trīsdesmitgadnieki Pīters un Emma nolēmuši sadarboties, lai sabotētu savu bijušo jaunās attiecības un atgūtu viņus uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Robots vārdā Čapijs
programme.desc: Čaplijs - brīnumbērns. Kā jau jebkurš bērns, viņš nokļūs savas apkārtējās vides ietekmē un tikai viņa sirds un dvēsele palīdz atrast savu īsto ceļu. Tomēr ir viena lieta, kāpēc Čaplijs nav līdzīgs visiem pārējiem - viņš ir pirmais robots, kurš spēj just un domāt.

programme.title: Guči nams
programme.desc: Patrīzija Reggiani - ārzemniece no pazemīgiem sociālajiem slāņiem - ieprecas Gucci ģimenē. Viņas nevaldāmās ambīcijas sāk izjaukt mantojumu un iedarbina neapdomīgu nodevības, dekadences, atriebības un galu galā slepkavības spirāli.

programme.title: Eleonoras rigbijas pazušana
programme.desc: Kāda pāra stāsts, kuri mēģina atgūt savu dzīvi un mīlu, kas reiz viņiem bijusi, saglābjot pagātnes detaļas, kas varētu sen jau būt zudušas.

programme.title: Vai spēsi man kādreiz piedot?
programme.desc: Lī Israela pagājušā gadsimta 70. un 80. gados karjeru veidoja, profilējot slavenības, piemēram, Ketrinu Hepbērnu, Estē Lauderu vai žurnālisti Dorotiju Kilgalenu. Kad viņa to vairs nespēja, jo bija zaudējusi ķērienu mainīgās gaumes dēļ, viņa, lojālā drauga Džeka mudināta, pievēršas maldināšanai.

programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 1. Baking show.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri revisits fired-up favourites. They include hot pizza in Boulder, CO, tasty turnovers in Mesa, AZ, and bomb BBQ in Memphis, TN.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri digs in diner style with mighty mac n cheese in Atlanta, brisket hash in San Antonio and a supreme breakfast burrito in Scottsdale, AZ.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 9. Cooking show.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped

Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Its a full-blown meat-fest when Guy Fieri checks out meatloaf in Las Vegas. Then, he hits up stuffed street tacos and unique burgers in New Jersey.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy visits a crepe shop in Vegas that serves everything from pork to peaches. Plus, he tries killer carnitas in Santa Barbara, California!

Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Summer Baking Championship
programme.desc: Ten amazing bakers whip up faux ice cream bars in summer flavours and put the judges into sunny "spirits" with summer cocktail tarts.

programme.title: Cilvēka dusmas
programme.desc: Jaunais inkasācijas firmas apsargs Patriks uz pārējiem kolēģiem atstāj noslēpumaina un ne pārāk runīga vīra iespaidu. Taču, kad kādas laupīšanas laikā viņš liek lietā savas šāvēja prasmes un vienpersoniski uzveic zagļus, kolēģi aiz pārsteiguma nemitējas spriest - kas šis vīrs īsti ir un no kurienes ieradies. Precīzā šāvēja nolūki drīz nāk gaismā: viņam padomā nokārtot senus rēķinus un viņš nepadosies, līdz nebūs izlīdzinājis svaru kausus.

programme.title: Venoms: Būs slaktiņš
programme.desc: Edijs Broks mēģina pielāgoties savai jaunajai dzīvei, esot citplanētiešu simbiota Venoma saimniekam, kas viņam piešķīris pārcilvēciskas spējas, lai viņš būtu nāvējoši modrs. Intervējot sērijveida slepkavu Kletusu Kasadiju, kurš kļūst par simbiota Carnage vadītāju un pēc neveiksmīgas nāvessoda izpildes izbēg no cietuma, Broks mēģina atjaunot savu karjeru.

programme.title: Ārpus kartes
programme.desc: Asa sižeta piedzīvojumu filma, kas veidota pēc populāras video spēļu sērijas, aizved mūs uz visdažādākajiem pasaules nostūriem, sekojot Neitam un Sallijam, kad viņi dodas bīstamā ceļā pēc "dižākajiem, nekad neatrastajiem dārgumiem", vienlaikus meklēdami Neita sen pazudušo brāli.

programme.title: Tumsa piecdesmit nokrāsās
programme.desc: Kad Kristians cenšas atgūt Anastasiju, meitene uzstāda dažādus noteikumus, pirms dot viņam vēl vienu iespēju. Viņu savstarpējās attiecībās pamazām no jauna uzplaukst uzticēšanās, taču Kristiana pagātnes tumšie noslēpumi ieskauj mīlētājus arvien ciešākā lokā ar vienu mērķi – iznīcināt viņu cerības uz kopīgu nākotni.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Superļaundaris Gru ir izmests no darba, jo neapturēja jaunāko cilvēces apdraudētāju. Viņš zaudē dzīvesprieku, bet to atgūst, kad uzzina, ka viņa neredzētais dvīņubrālis Dru vēlas viņu satikt. Gru ar ģimeni dodas uz brāļa grezno dzīvesvietu. Brāļi kopā uzsāks cīņu pret Baltazaru Bretu, kurš bērnībā bija slavenība, taču tagad kļuvis par superļaundari, kurš terorizē pasauli. Minioni uzsāk protesta streiku pret to, ka Gru vispār neinteresē iespēja valdīt pār pasauli.

programme.title: Zirnekļcilvēks: Mājupceļa nav
programme.desc: Pirmo reizi Zirnekļcilvēka filmu sērijas vēsturē mūsu draudzīgā apkaimes varoņa maska ir noņemta un viņš vairs nespēj nošķirt savu parasto dzīvi no riskantajām supervaroņa gaitām. Kad viņš lūdz palīdzību Doktoram Streindžam, likmes kļūst vēl augstākas, liekot viņam aptvert, ko patiesībā nozīmē būt Zirnekļcilvēkam.

programme.title: Ātrs un bez žēlastības
programme.desc: Jauns policists uzņemas veikt slepenu operāciju un iefiltrējas sacīkšu braucēju komandā, lai izmeklētu dārglietu laupīšanu. Vispirms cenšoties iekarot komandas vadoņu uzticību, viņš nonāk briesmās, un pārējos komandas locekļos mostas aizdomas par viltvārdi viņu rindās. Sadursme ir neizbēgama.

programme.title: Kosmoss manā galvā
programme.desc: Makss, Sofija un Gass no Kosmosa Aizsardzības spēkiem un viņu mikroskopiskais kosmosa kuģis kāda negadījuma laikā nonācis 16 gadus vecā Normana smadzenēs. Nanoizmēra citplanētiešiem jāpierunā Normans viņiem palīdzēt glābt zemi no ļaunā starpgalaktiku nelieša Zoltarda, kurš pāņēmis savā varā skolas direktori. Normanam kopā ar draugiem jācenšas noslēpt citplanētiešu klātbūtne skolā, vienlaikus turpinot galaktisko cīņu starp labo un ļauno.

programme.title: Spoku mednieki: Viņā pusē
programme.desc: Kad nomaļā pilsētiņā ierodas vientuļa māte ar divām pusaugu atvasēm, viņiem pamazām atklājas saikne starp slavenajiem spoku medniekiem un viņu vectēva atstāto slepeno mantojumu.

programme.title: Ševaljē
programme.desc: Āfrikas verdzenes un franču plantācijas īpašnieka ārlaulības dēls Boloņa Francijas sabiedrībā sasniedz neticamas virsotnes kā izcils vijolnieks, komponists un paukotājs. Tomēr mīlas romāns un strīds ar Mariju Antuaneti un viņas galmu Žorža Boloņas dzīvi padara nepanesamu.

programme.title: Bils un Teds nozog mūziku
programme.desc: Bils un Teds ir iestrēguši pusmūža problēmās. Abi ar sievām apmeklē pāru terapiju un nezaudē cerību īstenot mūziķu karjeru. Kādu dienu pie viņiem ierodas viešņa no nākotnes ar vēsti, ka tikai viņu radīta dziesma var glābt pasauli. Abi draugi dodas piedzīvojumā, lai beidzot piepildītu savu likteni. Ceļā viņiem palīdz meitas, dažādi vēsturiski tēli un vairākas mūzikas leģendas – kopīgi viņi meklē ideālo dziesmu, kas izglābs pasauli.

programme.title: Ātrs un bez žēlastības
programme.desc: Dominiks (Vins Dīzels) un viņa komanda domāja, ka viņi ir atstājuši noziedzīgo algotņu dzīvi aiz muguras. Viņi pieveica bēdīgi slaveno teroristu Ouenu Šo un devās katrs uz savu pusi. Bet tad Šo brālis Dekards atriebības vārdā vienu pēc otra sāk nogalināt komandas biedrus. Somāļu terorists, vārdā Džakards, un kāds šaubīgs valdības ierēdnis cenšas nozagt teroristu datorprogrammu "Dieva acs", kas var pārvērst jebkuru tehnisku ierīci par ieroci. Toreto ir atkal jāapvienojas ar savu komandu, lai cīnītos ar teroristiem, apturētu Šo un atgūtu "Dieva acs" programmu.

programme.title: Ragana
programme.desc: Ir 17. gs. 30. gadi Jaunanglijā. Viljamam (Ralfs Ainsons) un viņa ģimenei draud izraidīšana no ciemata, jo radies strīds ar baznīcu par Jauno Derību, tādēļ ģimene nolemj pamest ciematu. Galu galā viņi apmetas fermā savāda meža malā. Kad iet bojā iesētais, ģimene viens otru tur aizdomās paranojas iespaidā un ģimenes aizdomas vēršas pret meitu Tomasinu (Anja Tailore-Džoja). Ģimenes un fermas locekļiem liecoties zem savu aizdomu smaguma, Tomasinu sāk apsūdzēt raganu burvestībās.

programme.title: Svešinieki: 1. nodaļa
programme.desc: Kad dīvainā mazpilsētā salūst viņu auto, jauns pāris ir spiesta pavadīt nakti nomaļā būdā. Izceļas panika, jo abus sāk terorizēt trīs maskās tērpti svešinieki, kuri uzbrūk bez žēlastības un, šķiet, bez motīva. Šausmu filmas galvenajās lomās: Madelaina Petša (seriāls "Riverdale"), Gabriels Baso ("Vasaras karaļi", "Super 8") un Oskara balvas laureāte Reičela Šentone ("The Silent Child").

programme.title: Spiegs, kurš mani pameta
programme.desc: Divas labākās draudzenes, trīsdesmitgadnieces Odrija un Morgana, pašas pret savu gribu tiek ierautas starptautiskā sazvērestībā, kad viņu dzīvoklī pēkšņi uzrodas Odrijas bijušais draugs, kurš, kā izrādās, ir spiegs. Viņam uz papēžiem min algoti slepkavas, no kuriem tagad ir jāglābjas arī abām draudzenēm. Bēgot cauri visai Eiropai, draudzenes neticamā kārtā sveikā izkļūst no visām briesmām, turklāt pa ceļam vēl izdomā plānu, kā izglābt pasauli.

programme.title: Viņi
programme.desc: Pusaudžu grupa LGBTQ+ konversijas terapijas nometnē piedzīvo satraucošas psiholoģiskās tehnikas, kamēr viņus vajā noslēpumains maskēts slepkava.

programme.title: Kā pieradināt pūķi
programme.desc: Vikingu pusaudzis Hikaps dzīvo Berkas salā kopā ar savu valdonīgo tēvu. Kaujas ar pūķiem ir vikingu ikdiena un dzīves veids, taču Hikapu tās neaizrauj. Tā vietā viņš labprātāk nododas visvisādiem izgudrojumiem un apkārtnes iepazīšanai. Reiz kādā no saviem klejojumiem Hikaps sastop ievainotu pūķi, kuram palīdz atkal lidot. Šī sastapšanās maina abu dzīves. Un, kad pienāk iesvētību laiks – lielā iespēja kaujā ar pūķiem sevi pierādīt tēvam un visai ciltij –, Hikaps rīkojas pavisam neparasti.

programme.title: Trusītis Pēterītis
programme.desc: Ir mierpilna diena vienā no skaistākajām Anglijas vietām. Putniņi mīlīgi čivina, strautiņš urdz, un saule apmirdz zaļos pakalnus. Te pēkšņi cauri zālājam aizšaujas pūkains kamoliņš. Tas ir trusītis Pēterītis, un viņš dodas ļoti svarīgā misijā. Kopā ar trim māsiņām trusītis Pēterītis spriņģo taisnā ceļā uz Makgregora kunga mazdārziņa pusi. Tur izaudzēti labu labie dārzeņi, kas tā vien prasās tik apēsti. Taču reiz namā uz dzīvi apmetas Makgregora kunga radinieks, kurš par nelūgtajiem dārza labumu čiepējiem nemaz nav sajūsmā. Tā sākas nikni ķīviņi, jautri piedzīvojumi un daudz nepatikšanu, kurās trusītis Pēterītis kopā ar draugiem pamanīsies iekulties.

programme.title: Suņa dzīves jēga
programme.desc: Sirsnīgs un pārsteidzošs stāsts par uzticīgu suni, kurš, būdams līdzās dažādiem saimniekiem dažādos laikos, mācot cilvēkiem priecāties un mīlēt, atrod pats savas dzīves jēgu. Ģimenes filmu, kas aizraujošā veidā parāda pasauli no suņa skatu punkta.

programme.title: Krūdi
programme.desc: Aizvēsturiska piedzīvojumu komēdija par pasaules pirmo ģimeni, kura dodas unikālā ceļojumā, kad viņu dzimtā ala tiek iznīcināta. Ceļojot pa elpu aizraujošajām ainavām, Krūdi atklāj pasakainu, jaunu vietu, kur mīt vēl neredzētas būtnes. Viņu pasaules uztvere mainās uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Izvēle
programme.desc: Mīlestība? Atbildība? Nopietnas attiecības, ģimene? Iesīkstējušais vecpuisis Treviss Pārkers uzskata, ka tas viss nav viņam. Viņam ir labs darbs un uzticami draugi. Viņš aizraujas ar medībām, makšķerēšanu un ekstrēmiem sporta veidiem un izvairās no nopietnām attiecībām. Tomēr nav vēl dzimis cilvēks, kam būtu izdevies izvairīties no mīlestības….

programme.title: Atpakaļ nākotnē
programme.desc: Režisora Roberta Zemeka aizraujošā komēdija "Atpakaļ nākotnē" ir 80. gadu klasika. Tas ir stāsts par kādu pusaudzi, kas 1985. gadā sēžas pie stūres automašīnai, ko izgudrojis kāds ekscentrisks zinātnieks. Viņš negaidot nonāk 20. gadsimta 50. gados un nejauši novērš savu vecāku iepazīšanos. Tā vietā viņa māte iemīlas puisī, kas nākotnē ir viņas dēls. Viņš vēršas pēc palīdzības pie zinātnieka, kas izgudroja laika mašīnu, taču zinātnieks tagad ir 30 gadus jaunāks un ar mazāku pieredzi. Puisim jāizdomā, kā atrisināt sarežģītā situācija. Ja viņa vecāki neiemīlēsies, viņa nākotnē nemaz nebūs. Pat ja viņam tas izdosies, vēl jāizdomā, kā atgriezties nākotnē.

programme.title: Atpakaļ nākotnē
programme.desc: Turpinājums stāstam par amerikāņu jaunieša Mārtija ceļojumiem laikā. Šoreiz viņš kopā ar draudzeni Džeinferu no 1985. gada atgriežas nākotnē – 2015. gadā. Pēc tam Mārtijs spiests doties uz 1955. gadu, kur viņam ir iespēja labot savas iepriekš pieļautās kļūdas, lai nesabojātu savu iepriekšējo ceļojumu laikā. Pagātnē Mārtijs sastaps savus vecākus, kuri mācās vidusskolā, un iepatiksies savai mātei…

programme.title: Atpakaļ nākotnē
programme.desc: Ceļojumi laikā turpinās! No 1955. gada avīzēm Mārtijs uzzina, ka profesors Brauns ir gājis bojā vēl Mežonīgo Rietumu laikos. Lai glābtu draugu, Mārtijs pēdējo reizi dodas atpakaļ nākotnē...

programme.title: Kur vēži dzied
programme.desc: Dēlijas Ouensas sensacionālā romāna ekranizācija vēsta par Kiju – pamestu meiteni, kura pieaugusi viena pati bīstamajā Ziemeļkarolīnas dumbrājā. Gadiem ilgi tuvējā pilsētiņā Bārklijkovā klīst baumas par "purva skuķi", kas nošķir Kiju no sabiedrības. Kad viņa piesaista divu vietējo puišu uzmanību, Kija atver sirdi jaunai un pārsteidzošai pasaulei, bet, kad viens no puišiem iet bojā, visu aizdomas nekavējoties krīt uz purva vientuļnieci.

programme.title: Morbiuss
programme.desc: Cenšoties atrast zāles savai retajai ģenētiskajai slimībai, bioķīmiķis Maikls Morbiuss nejauši inficējas ar vampīrisma vīrusu.

programme.title: Nedžentlmeniskas karadarbības ministrija
programme.desc: Neticams un noklusēts patiess stāsts par pašu pirmo īpašo spēku organizāciju, ko Otrā pasaules kara laikā dibināja Vinstons Čērčils un neliela militāro ierēdņu grupa. Slepenā kaujas vienība, ko veidoja raibum raiba neliešu un disidentu kompānija, devās riskantā misijā pret nacistiem, izmantojot neierastas un pilnībā "nedžentlmeniskas" cīņas tehnikas. Viņu bezbailīgā pieeja mainīja kara gaitu un ielika pamatus mūsdienu slepeno operāciju karadarbībai.

programme.title: Neviens tevi neglābs
programme.desc: No sabiedrības izolējusies un baiļu pārņemta sieviete spiesta cīnīties ar citplanētieti, kurš iekļuvis viņas mājā.

programme.desc: Follow the coverage of the exciting football action from the matches of the top division of the Scottish Professional Football League.

programme.desc: Get all the action and cutting edge stories directly from the Arctic Race of Norway, annual multiple stage bicycle race held in northern Norway.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Real Madrid - Mallorca
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: Daphne and Ian aim to transform a 300-year-old outbuilding into a luxury home. Plus, the kitchen refurb may be doomed before it even begins.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: No Demo Reno

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. The remaining seven episodes presents her fixing up other peoples homes in Southern California. She puts a greater emphasis on design, which is her favorite part of the house-flipping process and she is happy to be able to create a space people have dreamed of.

With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: A duo of highly skilled thieves who specialise in hotel jobs go after the biggest target of their careers: New Yorks famed Pierre Hotel.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum hit the road to meet collectors from all over the country. Their first stop: Denver, Colorado, where Rick goes buck-ing broncos wild for a couple of antique cars, while Corey and Chum aim to stake their claim at a gold mine.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified with David Duchovny
programme.desc: What lies beneath? David Duchovny takes us into the top-secret government bases and the clandestine operations they were built to conceal. Discover a deadly poison lab operated by the Soviet Unions infamous "Doctor Death.

programme.title: Holy Marvels with Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: For millennia, plagues, curses, droughts, and the violent destruction of cities have been blamed on the wrath of angry gods. But were these divine punishments mere myth, or is there proof they are based on real events?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: Might these mysterious locations validate ancient legends of underground realms inhabited by extraterrestrial beings? And if so, what other otherworldly secrets might lie beneath our feet?

More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: A blind man who uses bat-like powers of echolocation to navigate his surroundings? A samurai with reflexes faster than a speeding bullet? A man immune to electrocution? These are the strange tales of humans with superhuman powers.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey and Chum are crossing the Delaware to forge top-notch deals in Valley Forge, Pennsylvania. The guys are flying high in a helicopter museum to face an army of eager sellers.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Kevin Costners the West
programme.desc: Following years of land encroachments by American settlers, Chief Little Turtle of the Miami leads the Indian Nations of the Northwest Confederacy to a major victory over the fledgling U.S. Army.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: A blind man who uses bat-like powers of echolocation to navigate his surroundings? A samurai with reflexes faster than a speeding bullet? A man immune to electrocution? These are the strange tales of humans with superhuman powers.

programme.title: Buried: Knights Templar Revealed
programme.desc: Join our hosts, Mikey Kay and Garth Baldwin, as they investigate whether the famed and mysterious Knights Templar were really disbanded and destroyed in 1307 or if they survived, taking the Holy Grail with them. The historical detectives journey through the middle-east in an attempt to uncover new evidence of the true fate of this secretive organization. Starting off in the holy city of Jerusalem, the team explore archaic tunnels and a safe house that could have been used to smuggle religious relics to safety. Their exploratory travels then take them to the ancient city of Acre and on to Cypress to search for clues about a covert Templar mission. Secret Templar codes lead the unit to a monastery in Spain which might be able to prove that the knights survived the fateful arrests of Friday the 13th, 1307.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In different parts of the world there are eyewitnesses who claim they saw various mythical, strange and even scary creatures, from vampires and ghosts to different types of monsters. These individuals tell their stories while a team of experts and scientists use any available evidence to try to find explanations for these unusual sightings.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: An alternative world thrives in the shadows of this capital city of lights. Host Eric Geller has special access to this dark underworld, where both the secrets of the living and the sins of the dead are revealed.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Dogs are known as mans best friend, but now canines are striking fear into many who report attacks by predatory packs. Descended from wolves, domesticated dogs were used as protectors. Today, more and more dogs are returning to their wild roots.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact.
