Its a far cry from the professional kitchen hes used to and hes handling ingredients that are completely new, but the food doesnt get better than this.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsays quest to master the worlds most fascinating cuisines lands him on the Indonesian island of Sumatra where he risks his safety and his pride to acquire the ingredients he needs. Whether working as a deckhand in the open ocean, exploring a daunting cave system, milking buffalo or being dragged behind them, Gordons commitment to world-class cooking is put to the test. With Indonesias own top chef, William Wongso looking over his shoulder, the pressure is high.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay explores the isolated Tasmania off the coast of southern Australia. Gordon will discover the purity of the island, diving into shark-infested waters for saltwater crayfish, avoiding venomous snakes in the bush foraging for local herbs, and soaring in a seaplane to the rugged interior to fly fish for trout and extract one-of-a-kind honey before facing off against culinary nomad Analiese Gregory to prepare an epic feast.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
programme.desc: This season Gordon is on culinary mission as he dives, fishes and forages across the world. From hand-catching rattlesnakes in Texas, to fighting waves hunting for barnacles in Portugal, Ramsays adventure takes him: lobstering in Maine; moonshining in the Smokey Mountains; rappelling for shrimp in Puerto Rico; bread making in Icelands volcanic sands; wrestling with conga eels in Croatia; and scaling cliffs for butterworms and honey ants in Mexico.

programme.title: No Taste Like Home with Antoni Porowski
programme.desc: Antoni takes Issa to her fathers homeland of Senegal, where they uncover ancestral stories of powerful women and royal connections. Through this culinary journey, Issa learns more about her familys epic history and how it all relates to her own identity.

programme.title: Tucci in Italy
programme.desc: Stanley ventures beyond Rome to Lazios less visited countryside to understand the relationship between the ancient metropolis and rural heartland. He samples a Roman pizza, porchetta from Ariccia, a rustic fish soup, and springtime lamb—dishes that share a culinary soul with beautiful ingredients allowed to speak for themselves.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: At Jorge Chavez International Airport in Lima, Peru, security personnel work to stop the flow of drugs out of the country. A divorced couple denies traveling together, but carry identical bags filled with cocaine. A bag containing a white powder tests negative for cocaine, and police decide to dig deeper. A suspect hides cocaine in the handles of his carry-on. A man is found with over 35 capsules of cocaine in his belly.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: The major challenge for police at Lima, Perus Jorge Chavez International Airport: stop drug-trafficking. Officers arrest a man with cocaine-filled food packages. He may be hiding more. An elderly woman is stopped with drugs embedded in her bag. A mother with a drug-saturated package her suitcase says she is also being sent to work as a prostitute. A man claims drugs taped to his body are for personal use. A long-lost bag contains cocaine.

programme.title: Paranatural
programme.desc: In every culture and for centuries, witnesses report strange encounters with apparitions, or ghosts. Believers point to the mountains of what they consider hard evidence: photographs of ghostly spirits, strange unexplainable voices, and objects flying across the room, as if thrown by unseen hands. But skeptics are just as convinced that there is nothing substantial to this phenomenon, and that belief in ghosts is unfounded. Are these spirits caught between this world and the next, or are they merely figments of wild imaginations?

programme.title: Paranatural
programme.desc: Theyre falling out of the skies, clogging up rivers and spoiling shorelines around the planet. Why are we seeing mass animal die-offs around the world? Scientists are searching for answers, while also studying why some species are beginning to vanish. In the United States, shrinking populations of bees and bats worry researchers. Are these die-offs natural occurrences, signs of a planet in distress, or are they beyond explanation?

programme.title: Paranatural
programme.desc: Different cultures call it different things: Bigfoot, Sasquatch, Abominable Snowman and Yeti, but theyre all talking about the same phenomenon and the descriptions are similar: large, hair-covered creatures that walk upright like humans; creatures that live out of sight across the world. Eyewitness accounts stretch back in time, but for many, the Sasquatch is the poster child of the Paranatural, a figment of fevered imaginations, a mere shadow in the woods. But those who say theyve come face to face with this elusive being have no doubt about its existence.

programme.title: Paranatural
programme.desc: From Loch Ness to the west coast of Canada, people are reporting sightings of sea creatures they cant explain. Witnesses swear theyve spotted creatures with flippers, long necks and horselike heads. Are they seeing remnants from the dinosaurs or mythical beings or just mistaking ordinary creatures for something Paranatural?

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: At Jorge Chavez International Airport in Lima, Peru, security personnel work to stop the flow of drugs out of the country. A suspect hides cocaine in the handles of his carry-on. A man is found with over 35 capsules of cocaine in his belly.

With Indonesias own top chef, William Wongso looking over his shoulder, the pressure is high.

programme.title: Supercar Megabuild
programme.desc: On this episode of Supercar MegaBuild, Jodie Kidd has an unusual request. She wants mechanics Shane and Dan to convert a family saloon Maserati Ghibli into something capable of going 200 miles an hour! Thats a big ask since its original top speed is just 150. In addition, Jodie also wants it to have a retro restyle to embrace the appearance of the legendary Maserati Tepo from the 1960s. With a supercar for a supermodel, the pressure is on!

programme.title: Supercar Megabuild
programme.desc: Returning for an epic second series, expert mechanics Shane and Dan take supercars and engineer them to the max! This series will see Maseratis going 200 mile an hour in Le Mans, an Audi R8 enter the Gymkhana Grid, and a Porsche turned into an ice-rally roadster. Alongside there will be Bentleys in the desert, Jaguars racing Spitfires and even an off-roading transporter carrying a Lamborghini. SuperCar MegaBuild: Even perfection can be perfected!

programme.title: Supercar Megabuild
programme.desc: Returning for an epic second series, expert mechanics Shane and Dan take supercars and engineer them to the max! This series will see Maseratis going 200 mile an hour in Le Mans, an Audi R8 enter the Gymkhana Grid, and a Porsche turned into an ice-rally roadster. Alongside there will be Bentleys in the desert, Jaguars racing Spitfires and even an off-roading transporter carrying a Lamborghini. SuperCar MegaBuild: Even perfection can be perfected!

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: The Battle of Jutland was the most violent sea battle in history, fought in 1916 between the mighty battle fleets of Britain and Germany. After a day of carnage, both sides claimed victory. So who really won? Maritime archaeologists and historians go in search of Jutlands secrets, hidden deep underwater. Scientific data combines with computer graphics to drain the North Sea, investigating the mega battleships of World War One and asks what happened to them once the firing was over.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: The Pacific Ring of Fire - an underwater hotbed of volcanoes, mega-quakes and giant tsunamis. 500 million people live in ever-present danger along its edges. Combining CGI with cutting-edge ocean-mapping technology we drain the Pacific Ocean to reveal the deadly geological forces behind Earths most destructive natural disasters, and uncover catastrophic threats lying just off the coast of Seattle, Tokyo and New Zealand.

programme.title: Colossal Machines
programme.desc: Historically, mining has been a very dangerous and labor-intensive process. Now, with the evolution of engineering, colossal machines have made the unthinkable possible. Engineering experts share the development and functions of gearless mill drives, giant metal shredders, and explosive-clearing vehicles.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: A container ship strikes the Francis Scott Key Bridge, causing it to collapse and paralyze the Port of Baltimore. Other fails include a roof collapse at a Dutch soccer stadium, a crane fire 45 floors over Manhattan, two Scottish towers that fail to fall in a controlled demolition, and a sewer pressure test in China that sends a "poonami" into the sky. Its enough to turn one to drink … at the Crooked House, Englands wonkiest pub.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: In Turkey, buildings claiming to be earthquake-proof end up falling down. Two gantry cranes bump into each other on a harbor in Taiwan; and a battery factory blows up in South Korea, resulting in a bad day at the office. Knob and tube wiring might be obsolete, but the Sydney Opera House is going strong, despite its many initial design flaws. The city of Dresden wishes they could reverse engineer the collapse of the Carola Bridge.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: In 1961, a body was found crushed under ice in a railroad car in Nebraska and quickly buried. After discovering his grave marked with the words "Unknown Negro," local journalist Marresa Burke is determined to find his family. Teaming up the DNA Doe Project, they take a sample from his exhumed body before following a trail of clues across the country.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they dont happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation

This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Colossal Machines
programme.desc: Contrary to popular opinion, nuclear energy can be very beneficial. In many industries, its being used to advance technology in unbelievable ways. Forensic and space mission systems engineers explain, in detail, the operation of radioisotope generators and the related systems that have been designed and powered by nuclear energy.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: An overpass on Philadelphias busy Interstate- 95 highway sets ablaze after a tanker truck rollover. Fails include the worlds most powerful radio telescope collapse, a swanky New York City skyscraper with a tall list of problems, a sinking airport in Japan, a whole lot of collapses in Nigeria, plus a museum renovation with a vision thats not quite crystal clear.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Was the tragedy of the space shuttle Columbia baked into the original design? A wave of ship strikes has Chinas bridge builders working overtime. Temporary stages are easy to put up and easy to take down, but sometimes they come down at the wrong time: suddenly and all at once. Check out hotels that tumble; take a tour of some of the worlds most expensive and useless airports, and learn why a Shanghai apartment tower dropped like a slab.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: In 1961, a body was found crushed under ice in a railroad car in Nebraska and quickly buried. After discovering his grave marked with the words "Unknown Negro," local journalist Marresa Burke is determined to find his family. Teaming up the DNA Doe Project, they take a sample from his exhumed body before following a trail of clues across the country.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: Bryan Johnsons first case as a new detective in 2020 was a homicide - a man found near an oil well site in Stark County, Ohio. But four years later, without even a name for the victim, Bryan has not been able to close the case. He enlists the help of the DNA Doe Project to try and find out the mans identity.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: An abandoned Cold War-era Russian military base is explored, and a palatial mansion is found decaying on Isla Grande off the Colombian coast. In the waters off of Japans Yonaguni Island, a stone structure is discovered on the seafloor. Evidence of a turbulent past is unearthed on Italys volcanic Stromboli Island.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Fifty-three human remains with gunshot wounds are unearthed on an uninhabited island in Croatia. Six mysterious flying objects are spotted above Puget Sound. On the Isle of Wight, paleontologists discover the fossilized remains of a previously unknown species of dinosaur. Strange ritual artifacts uncovered in Sweden signify the religious role of the island in medieval and ancient times.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: Bryan Johnsons first case as a new detective in 2020 was a homicide - a man found near an oil well site in Stark County, Ohio. But four years later, without even a name for the victim, Bryan has not been able to close the case. He enlists the help of the DNA Doe Project to try and find out the mans identity.

Forensic and space mission systems engineers explain, in detail, the operation of radioisotope generators and the related systems that have been designed and powered by nuclear energy.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: Lightning has struck an incoming international flight. Engineers assess the damage, as passengers become increasingly impatient. High winds lead to runway closures, adding pressure to flight schedules. Another plane arrives with potentially dangerous liquid leaking from its cargo. 3 ground crew who came in contact are quarantined until fire services can identify the liquid.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: Operating under a noise curfew between 0600-2300 hours, the pressure is on at Sydney Airport to complete 900 plane movements in a day. Duty Manager George is confronted by a suspicious package. Meanwhile Rookie Mel suddenly has 2 medical emergencies in the space of an hour. And a freight handling crew have a problem with loading a bulging cargo pod.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: Documentary series featuring fearsome fights between the biggest and the baddest animals on planet. Watch the animals fighting for their food, territory, rights and life. Follow the drama and adrenaline of the toughest and fearcest fights in savannah, jungles and water. It is an ultimate survival with no rules whatsoever. Uncover the extraordinary motivations and strategies used by the animal world.

programme.title: Africas Deadly Kingdom
programme.desc: Instead of providing in-depth examinations of the fauna of the continent of Africa, this nature series alternatively focuses on the hostile and unforgiving landscapes that the animals have to survive in. Africa is home to some of the most extreme and diverse environments on the planet, from arid deserts to lush rainforests, mountainous peaks to mighty river and lake systems, savannah grasslands to rugged coastline. This show explores these different regions and documents how the plants and creatures that inhabit them endure places where there are few resources of food and water or where competition is rife and life-threatening. The unique demands placed on these plants and animals have resulted in the development of incredibly resilient species that remain successful against all the odds.

Africa is home to some of the most extreme and diverse environments on the planet, from arid deserts to lush rainforests, mountainous peaks to mighty river and lake systems, savannah grasslands to rugged coastline. This show explores these different regions and documents how the plants and creatures that inhabit them endure places where there are few resources of food and water or where competition is rife and life-threatening. The unique demands placed on these plants and animals have resulted in the development of incredibly resilient species that remain successful against all the odds.

programme.title: Africas Deadly Kingdom
programme.desc: Instead of providing in-depth examinations of the fauna of the continent of Africa, this nature series alternatively focuses on the hostile and unforgiving landscapes that the animals have to survive in. Africa is home to some of the most extreme and diverse environments on the planet, from arid deserts to lush rainforests, mountainous peaks to mighty river and lake systems, savannah grasslands to rugged coastline. This show explores these different regions and documents how the plants and creatures that inhabit them endure places where there are few resources of food and water or where competition is rife and life-threatening. The unique demands placed on these plants and animals have resulted in the development of incredibly resilient species that remain successful against all the odds.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its summer in Michigan, which means time to bale some hay! Its a grueling process, but Dr. Pol, Charles, and Ben manage to mow their hayfield, which is the first step in baling. But a surprise rainstorm could ruin this years hay haul. They hope for sun, so their crop doesnt spoil before they can bale. Meanwhile, the Pols bring in their next animal to the farm - an emu!

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its the county fair season! The Pols plan to get at least two cows and six sheep at the auction, but they have a lot to do before that can happen. First up, they must install a new perimeter fence. Charles and Ben think they are off to a good start, but when Dr. Pol points out how sneaky sheep can be, their workload doubles. Meanwhile, Beth is hoping for a goat at the small animal auction.

programme.title: The Hidden Kingdoms of China
programme.desc: China is the worlds third biggest country by area. It has second largest economy on the planet and the largest population. But this documentary series takes you away from Chinas highly-populated mega-cities and explores the more remote locations of this fascinating country. Visiting forests, jungles, mountains and grasslands, we take a rare glimpse at parts of China that usually remain unseen. We see the wildlife that live amongst the stunning beauty of the Chinese landscapes - and how they survive in often demanding situations. With golden snub-nosed monkeys, bears, bees, elephants and the legendary giant panda. The Hidden Kingdoms of China is narrated by Michelle Yeoh.

programme.title: Africas Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: A land full of extreme environments and teeming with iconic wildlife, Africa holds a fascination like no other continent. This series takes the viewer on a journey from harsh desert landscapes to towering peaks, and from vast, sprawling grasslands to raging river torrents. The three episodes cover the mist-covered jungles and mountains of Rwanda and the great apes who call it home; the largest desert in the world, the Sahara, where the scarcity of water and food make life a daily challenge for the creatures who compete for them; and the cradle of humanity, Ethiopia, a weather-ravaged land full of natural beauty and unique wildlife.

programme.title: Eternal Enemies: Lions And Hyenas (Revealed)
programme.desc: The Jouberts Emmy winning film is back with stunning remastered footage. Propelled by Jeremy Irons gripping narration, Eternal Enemies reveals the story of conflict between lions and hyenas, relatively unknown or even suspected in the scientific world before this. The intense relationship and enduring rivalry between the two species play out in a battle of survival. Narrated by Jeremy Irons.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols need to break ground for a new outbuilding that will house incoming livestock and Charles has dreamt up an outrageous idea of what that structure can be - and it just may be just crazy enough to work. At the auction, the Pols are hoping to purchase sheep and cows, but the skyrocketing bids threaten their big plans.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The bidding is live at the large animal auction! The Pols are working towards their goal of bringing home sheep and cows to their farm. Any animals they win will be delivered to the farm in just three days, so the pressure is on to get the sheep hut finished in time - and there is a ton left to do. Meanwhile, Beth and Charles are concerned about the low activity in their beehives.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs Cheetah
programme.desc: Caught on tape in Africas wild Serengeti is a stunning act of violence between two top predators. Three cheetahs are brutally attacked by two male lions - the first time an attack like this has ever been filmed. Now, filmmaker Leo Kuenkel, who witnessed the attack, is trying to make sense of it. Was this a once-in-a-lifetime "perfect storm" event? Or do these iconic African cats have a deep-set, sinister reason to fight to the death?

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs Cheetah

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Spring rains bring new opportunities and hope to the land of the Iberian lynx. But for the female lynxes of the valley, it is always a challenge to raise their cubs. The series follows the lynxes in their struggle for survival, from the thrill of the hunt to the tender moments of parenting, and also witnesses their coexistence with other animals like majestic golden eagles or powerful deer.

programme.title: Future Cat
programme.desc: With cutting-edge visual effects, experts discuss the adaptations possible extreme scenarios might bring about in the big cats.

programme.title: A Leopards Legacy
programme.desc: A confident and powerful leopardess named Olimba, rules over an exceptionally large area along Zambias Luangwa river. She is a formidable hunter, a courageous ruler, and a devoted mother. Shes just given birth to two tiny cubs, and as she faces the challenging task of motherhood, its a constant battle to hunt successfully, to defend her prime territory, and to protect her cubs against her enemies

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Wild Kind
programme.desc: The great outdoors: fresh air, beautiful forests and incredible wildlife. But if you go down to the woods today, be prepared for every kind of surprise. From bears crashing picnics to cougars chasing trail runners, the animals that call this place home can be wild! Take a hike into the wilderness to discover how to avoid a run-in with a bison and when to duck if you see a deer.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Wild Kind
programme.desc: Soon two-thirds of the global population will be living in cities, leaving wild animals to develop a whole new set of street smarts. Whether thats a hungry bear raiding a supermarket, a street gang of monkeys committing daylight robbery, or a raccoon figuring out how to open a wildlife-proof bin - from Delhi to New York, these guys will stop at nothing.

programme.title: WNBA Weekly
programme.desc: Sports magazine bringing you all the most important news about the Womens National Basketball Association. Join to hear the latest stories and developments as the season goes on, and watch all the top basketball action.

programme.title: Sieviešu Nacionālā basketbola asociācija. Fīniksas "Mercury" - "Indiana Fever"
programme.desc: Get the best moments of the Womens National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in the United States. It currently is composed of twelve teams. The regular season is played from May to September, the All Star game is played midway through the season in July and the WNBA Finals at the end of September until the beginning of October.

programme.title: NBA Special
programme.desc: Get the highlights of the untold stories of Scottish basketball. A look back on the fierce rivalry between Edinburgh and Falkirk that started a golden era for the sport in the 1980s, and the success of the national team at the 2018 Commonwealth Games.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu. Barbagudrajam uznāk ģēnija cienīga iedvesma un viņš izgudro "Bam".

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella lepni ģimenei paziņo, ka nolēmusi kļūt par princesi. Barbabravo nīkst no garlaicības, jo brāļi un māsas ir aizņemti un negrib ar viņu spēlēties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons vada dārgumu medības, lai atrastu kapteiņa Zaļbārža laupījumu, bet vai viņi paliks draugi un dalīsies? Ikviens vēlas uzvarēt smilšu pils konkursā un baudīt īpašu saldējuma balvu, bet galvenais ir komandas darbs!

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Brauni glābj tuklīšu mazuļus, kuri, tā vietā, lai veiktu pirmo lidojumu, apmaldās apmetnē Padingtons kopā ar Džonatanu un Džūdiju izbauda niršanas piedzīvojumu - bet kur ir Džūdijas kaklarota?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem. Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ceļot skeitparku, komanda sastopas ar problēmu. Komanda palīdz popzvaigznei nogādāt savu autobusu pilsētā.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Toka skrienas ar laiku, lai redzētu pirmo pilno Saules aptumsumu savā mūžā. Padingtons saņem izgudrotāja balvu Simi vietā, kad viņa ir pārāk sakautrējusies, lai atzītos, bet kādēļ gan viņa pēc tam izjūt greizsirdību un skumjas?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Brauni dodas uz pludmali, lai pavadītu brīvdienas, un, ierodoties tur, satiek bākas uzraugu Šantiju. Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija apgūst glābēju praksi un ar glābēja Teilora palīdzību izglābj Brauna kungu.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kas rada dīvainos trokšņus alā? Džonatans domā, ka tā ir nāriņa, bet Padingtons nav pārliecināts Džūdija vēlas atrast fosiliju pludmalē, pārējiem, šķiet, veicas, izņemot viņu, vai Padingtons spēs palīdzēt?

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo kā slepenais aģents vada izmeklēšanu, bruņojies ar saviem rīkiem, lai uzzinātu, kurš nozaga Barbatēta torti. Barbalala ir pārliecināta, ka dzirdēja milzu vistu klīstam pa māju. Barbabērni stāv sardzē.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi - katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu - sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts - Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: No Piedzīvojumu līča atbrauc Rokijs, lai apciemotu Rabla komandu. Tieši laikā, lai redzētu Celtnieklīča jauno lācēnu! Kad reindžere Roza lūdz palīdzēt ar celtniecību, Ātrmeistars netīšām iznīcina lāču māju. Ķepaiņiem un Rokijam jāglābj situācija.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots. Barbamazuļi iestāda avokado koku. Taču līdz ražai jāgaida vairāki gadi. Barbagudrajam ir ideja ietaupīt laiku.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis ir noskumis, jo viņš pazaudējis brilles, tāpēc Pepa un Džordžs palīdz tās meklēt.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni izbraucienā pamana varavīksni.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs palīdz vectēvam dārzā iesēt sēklas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Džordžam sākas žagas, kad viņš par strauju izdzer sulu, tāpēc Pepa mēģina palīdzēt.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis izaudzējis lielu ķirbi. Pepa brauc ar savu riteni, bet vēlas to darīt bez palīgriteņiem. Drīz vien viņa ietriecas ķirbī.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Mamma iedod Pepai kasti, kas jātur noslēpumā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs dodas lidināt pūķi, bet tas iestrēgst kokā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni dodas piknikā. Tētis pēc lielās ēšanas aizmieg, bet tad kārtīgi izsportojas, bēgot no lapsenes.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Mamma un tētis bēniņos atrod instrumentu kasti. Pepa un Džordžs tos izmēģina.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz rumpuļiem pagatavot troļļa džemu, pirms Īgnais Trollis pārrodas, lai našķētos. Dorai un Zābaciņam jāatrod un jānoliek vietā burvju kaķītis, kurš visiem draugiem liek uzvesties kā kaķiem!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pirmoreiz bērni brauks ar vilcienu un pavadīs nakti viesnīcā. Barbabo rada lielisku sniegavīru.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par piedzīvojumu ar vilku. Rīt būs barbabērnu pirmā skolas diena.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda strādā, lai pārvērstu Celtnieklīča pludmales promenādi spožā, svinīgā ziemas brīnumzemē. Kad sniegota diena izjauc Motores un Miksas Virpuļvāveres plānus, Rabla komanda dara to, ko prot vislabāk... būvē.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz pūķītei Svītijai iemācīties lidot un atgriezties pie vecākiem Mākoņu alās. Kad Lielā Sarkanā Cāļa burvju triks liek Karalienei un Garnadzim samainīties vietām, Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz viņus pārvērst atpakaļ!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrajam uznāk ģēnija cienīga iedvesma un viņš izgudro "Bam".

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vasarā pilsētā ir ļoti karsti un komandas uzdevums ir to atvēsināt ar akvaparku.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots. Barbamazuļi iestāda avokado koku. Taču līdz ražai jāgaida vairāki gadi. Barbagudrajam ir ideja ietaupīt laiku.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus? Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Braucot ar riteņiem Barbapapu ģimene atrod viduslaiku pils drupas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Jaunais Fransuā pieredz Barbapapas dzimšanu. Barbatēti iesloga zoodārzā.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam ir grūti izvēlēties varoni īpašai foto sienai parkā. Varbūt viņam jāmeklē tuvāk mājām. Padingtons kļūst par varonīgu skeitbordistu, pateicoties Mateo un īpašai maskai, bet cik maģiska ir šī maska?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Teilors atklāj, ka ir viņa dzimšanas diena, bet kā lai draugi to padara īpašu, ja viņi par to nezināja? Ir Bērnsa nakts, un Bērdas kundze pastāsta Padingtonam par retu radību, ko sauc par savvaļas hagisu. Vai tas viņus apciemos?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karla jaunā restorāna būvdarbos notiek paukšķīgs pavērsiens. Rabls un viņa komanda ķeras pie uzkopšanas. Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pludmalē valda nekārtība, bet vai visi atkritumi tiks savlaicīgi novākti līdz pludmales ballītei, ko visi ir tik ļoti gaidījuši? Vasaras brīvdienas ir beigušās, tāpēc ir pienācis laiks atvadīties no jaunajiem draugiem.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam ir vēl vairāk piedzīvojumu, ieskaitot brīvdienas pie jūras un ļoti īpašu viesi no Peru!

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un robots Padingtrons izbauda varoņu lomu Vindzoru dārzos, bet kas ir tās dīvainās emocijas, ko izjūt robots? Padingtons atklāj, kā būt mierīgam saspringtā situācijā, un varonīgi aptur bēgošu kartingu!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbaliba, Barbalala un Barbabella pēc kārtas stāsta stāstu. Katra iekļauj tajā ko ļoti personīgu. Barbapapu ģimene pavada dienu pludmalē. Sadalījušies 2 komandās, barbabērni cīnās par smilšu pussalu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi - katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu - sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts - Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vardes, tārpi un tauriņi. Pepa un Džordžs atdarina skaistos tauriņus, lokanos tārpus un dubļainās vardes.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pedro ir lipīgs klepus, drīz vien saslimst arī pārējie bērni. Kad laiks doties, saslimst arī pieaugušie. Arī Gazeles jaunkundze. Dakteris Lācis iedod negaršīgas zāles, bet kas rūpēsies par viņu, kad viņš saslims?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs visus sasmīdina, kad pārģērbjas par mammu un tēti.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa pazaudē kurpes, bet tiek pie jaunām. Tagad viņa tajās ir tik priecīga, ka atsakās tās novilkt.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni dodas uz skolas pasāumu un izklaidējas, esot tur. Pepas un viņas draugu sejas nokrāso kā tīģeriem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir mammas dzimšanas diena, Pepa, Džordžs un tētis plāno lielu pārsteigumu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepai izkrīt zobs, tāpēc viņa to paliek zem spilvena Zobu fejai, bet baidās, ka tā varētu būt nejauka.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ģimenes auto saplīst, tāpēc Pepa ar ģimeni nomā citu, bet tas sāk uzvesties savādi.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vectēvs dārzā paslēpj dārgumus. Kad Pepa un Džordžs ierodas, viņiem tie jāmeklē.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz pūķītei Svītijai iemācīties lidot un atgriezties pie vecākiem Mākoņu alās. Kad Lielā Sarkanā Cāļa burvju triks liek Karalienei un Garnadzim samainīties vietām, Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz viņus pārvērst atpakaļ!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma atgriežas pie koka, zem kura piedzima. Tas ir sliktā stāvoklī. Viņiem tas steidzami jāglābj. Ir Barbamazuļu dzimšanas diena. Viņi katrs grib kaut ko citādu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī tiek uzbūvēta pirmā viesnīca, kad ciemos atbrauc fermeres Zojas brālēns Hedlijs. Kad juceklis uz dabas takas apmulsina visus Dakija Dū kunga dzimšanas dienas ballītes viesus, ķepaiņi viņiem palīdz atrast ceļu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni atrod dīvainu alu. Barbaliba stāsta par alām, un par to pārtapšanu. The Barbabērni nakšņo viesistabā. Bailēs no skapī mītošajiem briesmoņiem, viņi izliek ērmotus slazdus, lai noķertu tos.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella lepni ģimenei paziņo, ka nolēmusi kļūt par princesi.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kāds viesis sagādā ķibeles celtniecībā, kad komanda būvē spēļu istabu Lūkasam un Lilijai.

Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad komanda uzbūvē īpašu limonādes stendu Lūkasam un Lilija, īgnais Ātrmeistars ieripina to Celtnieklīča ielās. Kāpēc bebrs Krančijs šķērso ceļu? Jo Rabla komanda būvē tiltu, lai palīdzētu viņam nokļūt ceļa otrā pusē.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala un ģimenes dzīve! Barbagudrais un Barbabo uzbūvē milzīgu koka rotaļlietu, ko darbina bio degviela.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētā ierodas fermere, kas lūdz Rabla komandu uzcelt kūti viņas cūciņai. Vai suņuki paspēs to paveikt līdz lielajai Rukšu ballei? Motores īpašā dzimšanas dienas dāvana aizkavējas, jo izrādās, ka Celtnieklīcim vajadzīgs lielāks skrejceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Ir Zemes diena, un Padingtonam ir svarīgs uzdevums - iestādīt koku, bet vai viņš atradīs ideālu vietu, pirms ir par vēlu? Bazs rīko pavasara ražas svētkus, un visi tos izbauda, ienesot savas tradīcijas.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un viņa draugi nāk talkā konsteblam Velsam, lai atrisinātu pazudušā Vindzoras rubīna lietu. Pateicoties Lūsijas tantes īpašajai receptei, Brauni mājās uzsāk ēdināšanas biznesu, bet tas ir smags darbs.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam jāizvēlas starp Angliju un Peru, pirms sākas futbola kausa mačs, taču viņš abas valstis mīl vienādi stipri. Pienācis brīdis tantei Lūsijai doties mājās, bet atlicis laiks vēl pēdējam piedzīvojumam. Vai tomēr ne?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus. Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Cosmo and Wanda take this literally and give her hair a spirit, bringing it to life as Diana the Diva! When Hazel and Diana "butt heads" over how best to showcase her, Diana runs away. Hazel chases her all over town but cant catch her. Later, Diana shows up at Hazels school aiming to enter the contest on her own. Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest."

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Brainy and Lily are in the forest looking for some ingredients for Papa Smurf when Gargamel captures and locks them up. Shortly after, Gargamels mother comes by to ask him to look after his nephews. After one of their naughty pranks, Gargamel confiscates Dwayne and Rowenas toys, so to get even, the nephews decide to free the Smurfs. Upset, Gargamel takes his nephews to the ogre so only Brainy and Lily can save the children! // The Smurfs ask for Handys help to repair their belongings, but Handy always wants to do too much, adding options that are defective. The only one who manages to help the Smurfs is Diaper Daddy. Jealous of Diaper Daddys repair abilities and the fact that the Smurfs no longer ask for his help, Handy crafts himself an overpowered exoskeleton to improve his speed but Diaper Daddy remains the Smurfs favorite... Handy accidentally breaks his invention in anger and puts himself in danger. He must rely on Diaper Daddy to get him out of trouble!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Smurfs

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its picture day at school! And on top of that, theyre serving the most delicious pudding at lunchtime! Only problem is, Dev has control of the pudding supply and is hoarding it. Hazel takes the power back by wishing that everyone had an unlimited supply of pudding. Pudding is everywhere and Dev is out of business! But things take a turn when people cant stop eating it and turn into pudding zombies. Now Hazel not only has to save picture day, but also stop a pudding apocalypse! // Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Cosmo and Wanda take this literally and give her hair a spirit, bringing it to life as Diana the Diva! When Hazel and Diana "butt heads" over how best to showcase her, Diana runs away. Hazel chases her all over town but cant catch her. Later, Diana shows up at Hazels school aiming to enter the contest on her own. Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Cosmo and Wanda grant a wish to make Hazels potato project work for the Science Fair, they rewrite the rules of science for the whole universe! When the physical world goes haywire as a result, they cant undo it because not even their magic is not working correctly! And Sci, the Science Fairy, refuses to help Hazel because he does not approve of her shortcut. Hazel must learn the real science behind her potato project to power up Cosmo and Wandas wands and set the universe right again. // After watching a detective TV show with her dad, Hazel wishes she could solve a mystery like a genuine gumshoe. At first, she is wrapped up in the thrill of solving a mystery, but things get real when the landlord goes missing. Everyone is a suspect - kids at school, the strange new neighbors, and even Cosmo and Wanda! Things intensify when Hazel suspects her family is the next target. In a dramatic climax at dinner at her neighbors, Hazel unveils the truth. Is it foul play? Or is it just her imagination?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Winn, and Jasmine go to Patty Possums Party Playground, an entertainment fun zone for kids. Hazel wishes the animatronic Patty Possum would come to life. Patty joins the friends for the night and even brings them up to perform on stage! But at closing time, Patty doesnt want to lose her new friends, so she locks them inside the Party Playground. Cosmo and Wandas wands are stuck in the claw machine, so they cant help! They will have to evade this unhinged mascot without magic and find a way out. // Wanting Angela and Marcus to have a romantic anniversary, Hazel wishes that they would "fall in love all over again." When the wish causes her parents to forget each other, Hazel calls on Cupid to make them fall back in love. Upset that Hazel undid his work, Cupid challenges her to a competition in which Hazel and Marcus must compete with Cupid and Angelas old flame, Brewster, for Angelas affection. Can she beat Cupid at his own game and get her parents to fall back in love?

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Pat The Hapless goes on a barbaric quest to the shopping mall. // After Captain Quasar replaces Pat-Tron with a more efficient robot, Pat-Tron works for the Star family.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Cosmo and Wanda grant a wish to make Hazels potato project work for the Science Fair, they rewrite the rules of science for the whole universe! When the physical world goes haywire as a result, they cant undo it because not even their magic is not working correctly! And Sci, the Science Fairy, refuses to help Hazel because he does not approve of her shortcut. Hazel must learn the real science behind her potato project to power up Cosmo and Wandas wands and set the universe right again.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy is being chased by Gargamel. Lily and her dragon friend, Voltaire, come to his rescue. Scaredy feels bad about not being able to defend himself, so he also tries to befriend Voltaire. But without Lily as an interpreter, Voltaire ends up swallowing Scaredy Smurf whole! Lily, Papa Smurf and Willow do everything that they can to get him out of there, because its cold in the stomach of the ice breathing dragon... // Chef Smurf has burned the meal he was cooking but doesnt have any clean pans to start again. So, he uses one of Papa Smurfs old cauldrons, that he found abandoned in his laboratory. When Clumsy spills too many chilis in the cauldron, he manages to bring it back to life! The cauldron, once conscious, wants to get its revenge on Papa Smurf because it is upset about having been abandoned after many years of loyal services.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Its time for the Great Smurf Games in the village! The big prize? A magical sphere that grants all the members of the winning team one wish of their choice. Clumsy sees this as the perfect opportunity to become Agile Smurf, but no one wants to team up with him. Gargamel is also looking forward to the games because he wants to use the sphere to capture all the Smurfs! Hes well prepared and has set up traps all over the forest. The Great Games start with the traditional relay race. During the race, Storm and Grouchy are captured by Gargamel, who learns that only one Smurf who wins the Great Games will get a wish. So, he decides to send Dwayne and Rowena to take part in the Games, disguised as Storm and Grouchy. They go looking for the magical sphere, that has now been taken by Clumsy. They offer to team up with him, to his great surprise...

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.
